Best SkillsData.chapterDescr: Core programming and AI skills used in research and production web services.

Personal InterestsData.chapterDescr: Areas I explore outside coursework and internships to build skills and side projects.

ext Certificates and UniversityData.chapterDescr: Short courses and certifications that support my AI and web development work.

entries.name: B.Sc. Computer Science
entries.descriptionMarkdown:
#### Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

Focused on algorithms, data structures, and software engineering. Completed capstone integrating CV modules with a web frontend.

entries.name: M.Sc. Computer Science
entries.descriptionMarkdown:
#### Master of Science in Computer Science

Specialized in machine learning and computer vision with a thesis on real-time detection. Coursework and research strengthened PyTorch and deployment skills.

entries.name: Deep Learning Specialization
entries.descriptionMarkdown:
#### Deep Learning Specialization

Completed practical assignments on neural networks, CNNs, and sequence models. Learned deployment basics and best practices for model evaluation.

entries.name: Full‑Stack Web Dev
entries.descriptionMarkdown:
#### Full‑Stack Web Development

Built multiple full‑stack apps using React, Node.js, and RESTful APIs. Covered deployment, authentication, and CI/CD basics.

Job ExperienceData.chapterDescr: Internships and part‑time roles where I applied engineering and research skills.

entries.name: ML Research Intern
entries.descriptionMarkdown:
#### ML Research Intern

Worked on model optimization for edge devices and wrote reproducible experiments. Contributed to a paper draft and internal tooling for training jobs.

entries.name: Software Engineering Intern
entries.descriptionMarkdown:
#### Software Engineering Intern

Implemented backend services and REST APIs for analytics dashboards. Improved CI pipelines and reduced deployment time.

entries.name: Computer Vision Intern
entries.descriptionMarkdown:
#### Computer Vision Intern

Developed object detection models and dataset annotation tools. Integrated models into a real‑time prototype with latency testing.

entries.name: Web Developer (Part‑time)
entries.descriptionMarkdown:
#### Web Developer (Part‑time)

Built frontend features and improved UX for a student platform using React. Added accessibility improvements and optimized bundle size.

entries.name: Open Source Contributor
entries.descriptionMarkdown:
#### Open Source Contributor

Maintained and contributed to ML tooling libraries with bug fixes and feature PRs. Reviewed issues and helped onboard new contributors.

Previous ProjectsData.chapterDescr: Selected projects demonstrating AI, CV, web development and community contributions.
